timeline.message:
Fix WriteKafkaPTest.test_resumeTransaction failure

We waited for 2 seconds for the kafka to deliver the results, probably
it wasn't long enough. Also it could happen that we receive 1 record and
don't poll for the next, even though it wasn't the case this time.

An attempt to fix #2398

timeline.bodyText:
This will loop indefinitely if the records aren't received, failing with a generic test timeout.
Wouldn't it be better to try the poll several times and eventually fail with an error message saying "didn't receive X records within 30 seconds" or similar?
timeline.author: frant-hartm

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it would be better, but I think it's enough for now. The test maybe never failed.
replies.author: viliam-durina
